name: Monster Factory (Prototype)
description:
Use The Machine to create some monsters.

Use the arrow keys to move, and spacebar to perform actions.

---

I tried to make this playable in a web browser, but couldn't get the uploaded file to work properly, it kept freezing the browser :( For now it's downloadable, until I fix the issue. Unfortunately, this makes it only playable on Windows. I'm sorry!

This is basically just a slightly interactive display of all the cool art I made for the project.

My original plan was much more ambitious, and I couldn't work out how to do what I had in mind. As such, this prototype is just a little taste of the next version, which will give the player control over the type of monsters they make.
